user.subject: Your RungoMX account has been deleted

user.messageSelfDeleted: Your RungoMX account has been successfully deleted as requested. All your personal data has been removed from our systems.
user.messageAdminDeleted: Your RungoMX account has been deleted by an administrator. All your personal data has been removed from our systems.
user.dataExplanation: In compliance with data protection regulations, we have anonymized all personally identifiable information associated with your account, including your email, name, and profile details.
